LanguageData.NT_Sunglasses.label: Sunglasses
LanguageData.NT_Sunglasses.description: A generic pair of sunglasses, good for keeping the sun out of your eyes.
LanguageData.NT_HUDlasses.label: HUDglasses
LanguageData.NT_HUDlasses.description: A specialized pair of sunglasses used by Nanotrasen security personnel. The shades have a built-in HUD for monitoring security reports and checking criminal records on the fly.
